hyp_text: Mwana wa 1624, Kompwani ya Duthu ya India ya Mashya atungile kwa yinapu ya Taiwan ya yinapu, kulya kwa kushikola kwa yinapu ya kwalulu ya mazuwo yihela yize kuyishi nhi wupeme handji yikalu kunhina yinapu kuwena kusesa lya kalunga-lwiji, nhi kuyilwa kwa mazuwo a China kuyiwa kwa kwalulu ya mazuwo yihela yize kuyishi nhi wupeme handji yikalu kunhina yinapu kuwena kusesa lya kalunga-lwiji.

hyp_text: Hmashimbu halyi wa kuyilyinga kwaluwa halyi: kuyihinga, kuyimba, kuyiphotwara, kuyiwa ka mazuwo, kuyivwala mazuwo, kuyikwana mazuwo, kuyikwana mazuwo, kuyikwana mazuwo, kuyikwana mazuwo.

[English]: Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system.
[Chokwe]: {"translation": "Hacoco, akwa cifuci ca Belgas nhi Suiça alyi nhi lyimi lya Francesa kapwa kulomgesa Francês wamwenemwene kushikola, hanga akapwe nhi wunhingikiso wa kuyilyinga milalyi wa kwalula mulyimi lya Francês wamwenemwene."}

[English]: Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea.
[Chokwe]: {"translation": "Hmashimbu a khama lya myaka, athu atungile kanawakanawa kwilu lya mazuwo yihela yize kuyishi nhi wupeme handji yikalu kunhina yinapu kutunga kusesa lya kalunga-lwiji."}

[English]: 800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska.
[Chokwe]: {"translation": "800 ja thando ja mana a kalinana yijipua kuyika muze haatokisa tununu tua tuthinhi ja maji a lemu ku utho wa Fairbaks mu Alaska."}

[English]: Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution.
[Chokwe]: {"translation": "Yihela alyinayo Bélgica musono yapwile te yihela y Luxemburgo kumashimbu akunhima, yapwa ya Belgas muze kwapwile wutusuko wa Belga mumwaka wa 1830."}

[English]: Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World.

src_text: To better represent traffic flow, relationships have been established between the three main characteristics: (1) flow, (2) density, and (3) velocity.
ref_text: Mba hanga asolole kanawa kuphukumuka ca minhau hikupwa kulicata uendo kakuthuala há ipha itathu ize yahamucima: (1) kuphukumuka (2) kuthualoho (3) minanga handji kuzomboka.

hyp_text: Apiya kwa lulwa lya 1850, kwa pwa nhi wulengo wa kwapwile wu kwa lulwa lya Samoa kwapwile kwa 1959.

[English]: Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea.
[Chokwe]: {"translation": "Hmashimbu a khama lya myaka, athu atungile kanawakanawa kwilu lya mazuwo yihela yize kuyishi nhi wupeme handji yikalu kunhina yinapu kutunga kusesa lya kalunga-lwiji."}

[English]: 800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska.
[Chokwe]: {"translation": "800 ja thando ja mana a kalinana yijipua kuyika muze haatokisa tununu tua tuthinhi ja maji a lemu ku utho wa Fairbaks mu Alaska."}

[English]: Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution.
[Chokwe]: {"translation": "Yihela alyinayo Bélgica musono yapwile te yihela y Luxemburgo kumashimbu akunhima, yapwa ya Belgas muze kwapwile wutusuko wa Belga mumwaka wa 1830."}
